statements: SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails WHERE ingredient_1 = 'Vodka';
SELECT * FROM cocktails ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_1, ingredient_2 FROM cocktails WHERE price < 10.00;
SELECT cocktail_name FROM cocktails WHERE ingredient_1 = 'Tequila' AND ingredient_2 = 'Lime Juice';
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 15.00;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY cocktail_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails WHERE ingredient_1 = 'Rum' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_1, ingredient_2 FROM cocktails WHERE ingredient_3 IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM cocktails WHERE ingredient_2 LIKE '%Vodka%' OR ingredient_3 = 'Gin' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails WHERE ingredient_1 = 'Tequila' AND ingredient_2 = 'Lime Juice' OR ingredient_3 = 'Triple Sec';
SELECT id, name, price, ingredients FROM cocktails;
SELECT name, price FROM cocktails ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 2;
SELECT cocktail_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY cocktail_id;
SELECT name, price, ingredients FROM cocktails WHERE price < 10 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY price ASC, name ASC;
SELECT name, ingredients FROM cocktails WHERE ingredients LIKE '%whiskey%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT c.name AS cocktail_name, o.order_date AS order_date, o.quantity, o.total_price FROM cocktails c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.cocktail_id WHERE o.quantity > 1 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_orders, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(total_price) AS average_price FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_price FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_price > 10;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_price, ingredients FROM cocktails ORDER BY cocktail_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total < 50 ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_price FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_price > 10 ORDER BY cocktail_name ASC
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales WHERE revenue < 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredients FROM cocktails WHERE ingredients->>'primary' = 'vodka'
SELECT cocktail_name, cocktail_price, ingredients FROM cocktails WHERE cocktail_price < 20 AND ingredients->>'secondary' = 'lime'
SELECT * FROM cocktails;
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10;

SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT cocktail_name, total_price FROM cocktails JOIN sales ON cocktails.cocktail_id = sales.cocktail_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, quantity, sale_date FROM cocktails JOIN sales ON cocktails.cocktail_id = sales.cocktail_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails ORDER BY cocktail_name DESC, price ASC;

SELECT cocktail_name, price, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT cocktail_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(total_price) AS total_revenue FROM cocktails JOIN sales ON cocktails.cocktail_id = sales.cocktail_id GROUP BY cocktail_name;
SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails CROSS JOIN ingredients;
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM cocktails
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails ORDER BY price DESC

SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id
SELECT cocktail_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS num_ingredients FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id GROUP BY cocktail_name
SELECT DISTINCT cocktail_name FROM cocktails
SELECT * FROM cocktails
SELECT cocktail_name, price FROM cocktails WHERE price > 10

SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id
SELECT cocktail_name, COUNT(ingredient_id) AS total_ingredients FROM cocktails JOIN cocktail_ingredients ON cocktails.cocktail_id = cocktail_ingredients.cocktail_id GROUP BY cocktail_name
SELECT cocktail_name, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM cocktails GROUP BY cocktail_name HAVING AVG(price) > 15
